name: Evolve Digital Deluxe
description:
Get the main game plus  Hunting Season 1.  Hunting Season 1 includes 4 more hunters for one low price. Plus, get 3 exclusive Magma monster skins and  4 exclusive Artic Hunter skins.
 
Evolve is a true next generation multiplayer shooter featuring addictive adrenaline-pumping 4v1 action.  One player-controlled monster must evade and outsmart a team of four uniquely skilled playable hunters. It’s survival of the fittest and any side can win.  CHOOSE YOUR SIDE.
